Chill until serving.

Title: Western Omelet Bites
Description: Create the tastiest Western Omelet Bites, Tostitos® own Western Omelet with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Western Omelet for any occasion.
Ingredients:
3 eggs
 1/2 bell pepper, diced
 1/2 onion, diced
5 chopped mushrooms
1 cup grated cheddar cheese
1 jar Tostitos® Salsa
1 bag Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips
Directions:
Scramble eggs with all vegetables.
Place a spoonful of egg mixture into Scoops!® and top with salsa and grated cheese.
Place in oven for few minutes until cheese has melted.
Serve immediately.

Title: White Garlic Dip
Description: Create the tastiest White Garlic Dip, Tostitos® own Garlic Dip with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Garlic Dip for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 cup low-fat mayonnaise
1 cup low-fat sour cream
Juice of 3 limes
4 cloves garlic, crushed
1  1/2 cups finely chopped fresh cilantro
1  1/2 cups finely chopped shallots
5 tsp hot pepper sauce, or to taste
Salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste
1 bag Tostitos® Organic Blue Corn tortilla chips
Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine mayonnaise and sour cream.
Add lime juice, garlic, cilantro, shallots, hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper.
Chill until serving.

Title: Chorizo and Manchego Cheese Party Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Chorizo and Manchego Cheese Party Nachos, Tostitos® own Chorizo and Manchego Cheese Party Nachos Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Chorizo and Manchego Cheese Party Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 raw chorizo sausages
1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar Blend cheese
 1/2 cup Manchego cheese crumbled
1 tomato seeded and diced
1 yellow pepper, diced
1 red onion, sliced
1 cup black olives, sliced
1 or 2 jalapenos, thinly sliced (optional)
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick tortilla chips
1 jar Tostitos® Salsa
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350° F.
Remove casings from the sausages.
Crumble the sausage meat into a hot frying pan and saute breaking up the meat with a spoon until starting to brown.
Add the minced garlic and cook for 2 more minutes.
Remove from heat, drain the excess fat and set aside.
Spread  1/2 the Tostitos onto a large ovenproof dish and scatter with  1/2 of all the ingredients.
Spread a second layer of chips and scatter with all the remaining toppings finishing with the cheeses.
Bake on center rack of oven for 12–15 mins.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

Title: Breakfast Burrito
Description: Create the tastiest Breakfast Burrito, Tostitos® own Breakfast Burrito Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Breakfast Burrito for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 tbsp milk
 1/2 small sweet green pepper, seeded and diced
2 tbsp shredded cheddar cheese
1 small flour tortilla
Pinch of salt and pepper
2 tbsp Tostitos® Salsa
Directions:
Whisk eggs, milk, green pepper, salt and pepper in small bowl.
Spray skillet with cooking spray.
Heat skillet over medium‑high heat until hot enough to sizzle a drop of water.
Pour in egg mixture and immediately reduce heat to medium‑low.
As eggs begin to set, gently move spatula across bottom and side of skillet to form large, soft curds.
Cook until eggs are thickened and no visible liquid egg remains, but the eggs are not dry.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Spoon the eggs in the centre of the tortilla and top with Tostitos® Salsa.
Fold up the bottom and then the sides to enclose filling.

Title: One-bite Fish Tacos
Description: Create the tastiest One-bite Fish Tacos, Tostitos® own Fish Tacos Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best One-bite Fish Tacos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/4 cup sour cream
2 tbsp water
1 tsp lime zest
2 serrano chilies,de-seeded and minced
1 cup coarsely grated red cabbage
 1/4 cup coarsely grated red onion
2 tbsp lime juice
⅓ cup all-purpose flour
 1/2 tsp salt
300 g boneless cod fillet
2 tbsp canola oil
 1/2 cup finely diced pineapple
40 cilantro leaves
1 bag Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips
Directions:
Stir sour cream with water, lime zest and chilies in a small bowl. Set aside.
Combine cabbage with onion and lime juice in a medium bowl. Set aside.
Stir flour with salt in a medium bowl. Season with pepper.
Cut cod fillet into  1/2‑in. cubes.
Toss with fl our mixture until completely coated.
Heat a large non‑stick frying pan over medium‑high. Add oil, then cod.
Cook until browned, 1 to 2 min. per side.
Remove from heat.
Assemble tacos by filling Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips with pineapple, then cabbage slaw, then cod. Top with sour cream mixture, then cilantro leaf. Serve immediately.

Title: Asian Salad Scoops!®
Description: Create the tastiest Asian Salad Scoops, Tostitos® own Asian Salad Scoops Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Asian Salad Scoops Recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 lb (250 g) lean ground beef
2 tbsp hoisin sauce
 1/4 cup shredded lettuce
 1/4 cup matchstick carrots
 1/4 cup finely chopped mango
 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro (optional)
2 tbsp sour cream
1 tbsp sweet Thai chili sauce
40 ( 1/2 bag) Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Set a medium nonstick skillet over medium‑high heat.
Crumble in the beef.
Cook, stirring and breaking into small pieces, for 5 minutes or until browned.
Stir in the hoisin.
Cook for 3 minutes or until cooked through.
Cool slightly.
Arrange the Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips on a serving platter.
Divide the beef evenly between the chips.
Top with lettuce, carrot, mango and cilantro (if using).
Stir the sour cream with chili sauce.
Dollop over each chip.
Serve immediately.
Makes 40 bites.
Tip: Prepared matchstick carrots can be found in the produce section near the coleslaw.

Title: Baked Hawaiian Skillet Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Baked Hawaiian Skillet Nachos, Tostitos® own Baked Hawaiian Skillet Nachos Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Baked Hawaiian Skillet Nachos Recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
4 cups shredded chicken
2  1/2 cups smoky BBQ sauce
1 cup chopped pineapple
1 cup chopped red pepper
1 cup chopped red onion
3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
 1/2 cup chopped green onion or fresh cilantro
1 bag Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Toss the chicken with the BBQ sauce, pineapple, red pepper and red onion.
Layer one‑third the Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips, chicken mixture and mozzarella in an ovenproof skillet.
Repeat layers twice.
Bake at 400° F (200° C) for 15 minutes or until the cheese is melted.
Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
Sprinkle with green onion or cilantro.
Makes 8 servings.
Tip: Save time and use a rotisserie chicken from the deli.

Title: Red Pepper Pesto Bruschetta
Description: Create the tastiest Red Pepper Pesto Bruschetta, Tostitos® own Red Pepper Pesto Bruschetta Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Red Pepper Pesto Bruschetta for any occasion.
Ingredients:
3 whole tomatoes, diced
1 small onion, diced
1 cup crushed pecans
1 bunch basil, minced
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 cup extra virgin olive oil
1 tsp kosher salt and pepper
1 cup fresh roasted red pepper, cut into strips
1 cup aged parmesan
1 bag Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Mix all ingredients, except for Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips Tortilla Chips, together in bowl.
Spoon mixture into Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips and serve.

Title: Dessert Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Dessert Nachos, Tostitos® own Dessert Nachos Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Dessert Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/4 cup brown sugar
1 tsp ground cinnamon
1/3 cup chocolate sauce
1 1/2 cups chopped strawberries
1 banana, peeled and thinly sliced
Sweetened whipped cream
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Arrange Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin Tortilla Chips on two large baking sheets.
Lightly coat with cooking spray; sprinkle sugar and cinnamon over top.
Toss until evenly coated.
Bake at 350°F for 15 minutes until crisp.
Cool slightly.
Arrange the chips on a long, shallow serving platter.
Drizzle chocolate over the chips.
Scatter the strawberries and banana over top.
Serve with whipped cream for dipping.
Makes 8 servings.
Tip: Use any of your favourite fruit to garnish this nacho platter.

Title: Layered Greek Dip
Description: Create the tastiest Layered Greek Dip, Tostitos® own Layered Greek Dip Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Layered Greek Dip for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1  1/2 cups tzatziki dip
1  1/2 cups chopped cucumber
1 tomato, seeded and diced
 1/4 cup chopped red onion
 3/4 cup sliced kalamata olives
1 cup crumbled feta cheese
1 bag Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Spread tzatziki in a shallow platter.
Scatter the cucumber, tomato and onion over top.
Sprinkle with feta and olives.
Serve with Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds Tortilla Chips.
Makes 12 servings.
Tip: For an authentic twist garnish with a drizzle of olive oil and dried oregano.

Title: Mini Shredded Chicken Tostadas
Description: Create the tastiest Mini Shredded Chicken Tostadas, Tostitos® own Mini Shredded Chicken Tostadas Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Mini Shredded Chicken Tostadas for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 cup shredded chicken
 1/2 cup shredded Tex-Mex cheese blend
 1/4 cup sour cream
 1/4 cup finely chopped green onion
 1/2 cup Tostitos® Medium Salsa
40 (1/5 bag) Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Toss the chicken with the salsa.
Arrange the Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds Tortilla Chips in an even layer on a baking sheet.
Top each chip with some of the shredded chicken mixture and cheese.
Broil for 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Carefully transfer to a serving platter.
Dollop with sour cream and sprinkle with green onion.
Serve immediately.
Makes 40 bites.

Title: Mini Huevos Rancheros
Description: Create the tastiest Mini Huevos Rancheros, Tostitos® own Mini Huevos Rancheros Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Mini Huevos Rancheros for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 tbsp canola oil
12 eggs
 1/4 cup milk
 1/4 tsp each salt and freshly ground pepper
 1/2 cup shredded Tex-Mex cheese blend
2 tbsp finely chopped chives
40 ( 1/2 bag) Tostitos® Restaurant Style Multigrain Tortilla Chips
 1/2 cup Tostitos® Roasted Red Pepper Salsa
Directions:
Heat the oil in a large nonstick skillet set over medium heat.
Whisk the eggs with the milk, salt and pepper; pour into the skillet.
Cook, without stirring, for 1 minute or until starting to set on the bottom.
Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes or until small curds set but are still tender.
Arrange the Tostitos® Restaurant Style Multigrain Tortilla Chips on a serving platter.
Top each chip with scrambled eggs and salsa.
Sprinkle with cheese and chives.
Broil for 3 minute or until cheese is melted.
Serve immediately.
Makes 40 bites.

Title: Lasagna Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Lasagna Nachos, Tostitos® own Lasagna Nachos Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Lasagna Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 lb (500 g) lean ground beef
 1/2 tsp each salt and pepper
2 cups tomato sauce
 1/2 cup  chopped fresh basil
3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Set a large nonstick skillet over medium‑high heat.
Crumble in the beef; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Cook, stirring and breaking into small pieces, for 5 minutes or until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce.
Simmer for 5 to 7 minutes or until sauce is thick and beef is cooked through.
Stir in the basil.
Arrange one‑third of the Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips in a 7x11‑inch (2 L) lasagna pan.
Top with one‑third of the beef mixture and the mozzarella.
Repeat layers twice.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 15 minutes or until the cheese is melted.
Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
Makes 8 servings.
Tip: Make a veggie lasagna nacho platter by replacing the ground beef with chopped roasted vegetables.

Title: Roasted Eggplant Dip
Description: Create the tastiest Roasted Eggplant Dip, Tostitos® own Roasted Eggplant Dip Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Roasted Eggplant Dip for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 eggplants, chopped
1 onion, chopped
 1/4 cup olive oil
1  1/2 tsp salt
 1/2 tsp freshly ground pepper
8 cloves garlic, minced
 1/2 cup tahini paste
2 tbsp lemon juice
1 tsp ground cumin (optional)
 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley
 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese
1/2 tsp paprika
Lemon wedges
1 bag Tostitos® Artisan Recipes™ Grilled Red Pepper & Tomato Salsa Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Toss the eggplant with the onion, oil, salt, pepper and garlic.
Spread out in an even layer on a baking sheet.
Roast at 400°F (200°C) for 45 minutes or until tender.
Cool slightly.
Transfer the roasted eggplant, tahini, lemon juice and cumin to a food processor.
Pulse until smooth; stir in the parsley.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Scrape into a shallow bowl.
Scatter feta over top and dust with paprika.
Serve with Tostitos®  Artisan Recipes® Grilled Red Pepper & Tomato Salsa Tortilla Chips and lemon wedges.

Title: Taco Night in One Bite
Description: Create the tastiest Taco Night in One Bite, Tostitos® own Tostitos® Tacos Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Tostitos® Tacos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
40 ( 1/2 bag) Tostitos®  Scoops!®  Tortilla Chips
 1/2 lb lean ground beef
1 tbsp Tex-Mex seasoning blend
 1/2 cup shredded lettuce
 1/2 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
 1/4 cup sour cream
 1/4 cup Tostitos® Medium Salsa
 1/4 cup finely chopped green onion
Directions:
Set a nonstick skillet over medium‑high heat.
Crumble in the beef.
Cook, stirring and breaking into small pieces, for 5 minutes or until browned.
Sprinkle the seasoning over the meat; stir in 1/4 cup (60 mL) water.
Simmer for 5 minutes or until liquid has evaporated and beef is cooked through.
Cool slightly.
Arrange the Tostitos®  Scoops!®  Tortilla Chips on a serving platter.
Divide the beef evenly between the cups.
Top with lettuce, cheese, sour cream, salsa and green onion.
Serve immediately.
Makes 40 bites.

Title: Salmon Cheese Bites
Description: Create the tastiest Salmon Cheese Bites, Tostitos® own Salmon Cheese Bites Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Salmon Cheese Bites for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 cup mascarpone cheese, room temperature
 1/2 cup goat cheese, room temperature
1 tbsp chopped fresh dill
 1/4 tsp coarsely ground black pepper
3 oz (90 g) smoked salmon, cut into ribbons
40 (1/2 bag) Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips
 3/4 cup Tostitos® Mild Salsa
Directions:
Stir the mascarpone with the goat cheese, dill and pepper.
Divide evenly between the Tostitos!®  Scoops!®  Tortilla Chips.
Top with salsa and smoked salmon.
Garnish with additional dill.
Makes 40 bites.
Tip: Save some time and use dried dill instead of fresh dill.

Title: Beef Queso Fundido Dip
Description: Create the tastiest Beef Queso Fundido Dip, Tostitos® own Beef Queso Fundido Dip with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Beef Queso Fundido Dip for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 lb (500 g) lean ground beef
2 tbsp Tex-Mex seasoning blend
1 green onion, finely chopped
2 jars Tostitos®  Salsa con Queso
 1/2 cup Tostitos®  Roasted Red Pepper Salsa
1 bag Tostitos Cantina®  Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Set a cast iron or nonstick skillet over medium‑high heat.
Crumble in the beef.
Cook, stirring and breaking into small pieces, for 5 minutes or until browned.
Sprinkle the seasoning over the meat; stir in 1/4 cup  water.
Simmer for 5 minutes or until liquid has evaporated and beef is cooked through.
Transfer to a plate.
Pour in the Tostitos® Salsa con Queso into the same skillet.
Simmer for 5 minutes or until heated through.
Scatter the meat mixture over the skillet.
Spoon the salsa in the center of the skillet and sprinkle with green onion.
Serve immediately with Tostitos Cantina®  Extra Thick Tortilla Chips.
Makes 12 servings.

Title: Watermelon pico de gallo
Description: Create the tastiest Watermelon pico de gallo, Tostitos® own Watermelon pico de gallo Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Watermelon pico de gallo for any occasion.
Ingredients:
4 cups finely chopped watermelon
2 cups finely chopped cucumber
 1/2 cup finely chopped red onion
 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh cilantro
1 jalapeño, seeded and diced
 1/4 cup fresh lime juice
2 tsp finely grated lime zest
2 tsp honey
 1/4  tsp salt
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Toss watermelon with cucumber, onion, cilantro and jalapeno.
Whisk lime juice with zest, honey and salt.
Stir into the watermelon mixture.
Chill for 30 minutes.
Serve with Tostitos®  Cantina® Extra Thin Tortilla Chips.
Makes 12 servings.

Title: Cheesy Bean and Kale Bake
Description: Create the tastiest Cheesy Bean and Kale Bake, Tostitos® own Cheesy Bean and Kale Bake Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Cheesy Bean and Kale Bake for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 tbsp olive oil
3 garlic cloves, minced
 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes
220g  kale, torn and tough ribs removed
 1/4 cup water
2 cans (425 g) no-salt added cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
 3/4 cup part-skim ricotta cheese
1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese
1 cup crushed Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350° F.
In a large (11 or 12‑inch) ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes, sauté 1 minute.
Mix in kale and water; sauté 3 – 4 minutes or until kale starts to wilt a bit.
Turn off heat.
Mix in beans, ricotta, half of the Parmesan cheese (1/6 cup) and half of the crushed Tostitos®  Original Restaurant Style tortilla chips.
(1/2 cup.
) Bake in oven for 15 minutes.
In a small bowl, mix together remaining parmesan cheese and crushed Tostitos®  Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips.
Sprinkle over top of casserole and cook for another 10 minutes.
Serve warm.
*If you can’t find no‑salt added canned beans, use regular canned beans.
Drain and rinse thoroughly with water.

Title: Chili Cheese Bake
Description: Create the tastiest Chili Cheese Bake, Tostitos® own Chili Cheese Bake Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Chili Cheese Bake for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 (226 g) pkgs cream cheese
2 small cans chili with no beans
1 lb lean ground beef, cooked
340 g bag shredded cheddar and/or Monterey Jack cheese
1 bag Tostitos®  Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips, coarsely crushed
1 jar Tostitos® Salsa (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°F.
To assemble, spread cream cheese evenly in a lightly greased 9”x13” baking pan.
Layer chili, cooked ground beef, half of the shredded cheese, crushed Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips and the remainder of the shredded cheese in the order given.
Bake uncovered for approximately 15–20 minutes or until cheese melts.
Serve immediately Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips with Tostitos® Salsa on the side, if desired

Title: Egg Salad Bites
Description: Create the tastiest Egg Salad Bites, Tostitos® own Egg Salad Bites Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Egg Salad Bites for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 cup whipped salad dressing or mayonnaise
 1/2 cup finely chopped fresh parsley
2 green onions, finely chopped
1 celery stalk, finely chopped
 1/4 tsp each salt and freshly ground black pepper
12 hard boiled eggs, peeled and chopped
Paprika or smoked paprika
40 ( 1/2 bag) Tostitos® Scoops!® Multigrain Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Stir the dressing with the parsley, green onions, celery, salt and pepper.
Stir in the eggs.
Chill for 2 hours.
Divide evenly between the Tostitos® Scoops!®  Multigrain Tortilla Chips.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Makes 40 bites.
Tip: The egg salad can be made up to 3 days in advance.

Title: Feta, Date and Honey Dip
Description: Create the tastiest Feta, Date and Honey Dip, Tostitos® own Feta, Date and Honey Dip Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Feta, Date and Honey Dip for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 pkg plain, brick-style cream cheese, softened
2 cups sour cream
4 tsp honey, divided
1 cup crumbled feta cheese, divided
 1/2 cup pitted medjool dates, chopped
 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh parsley
 1/4 tsp freshly ground black pepper
 1/4 cup toasted slivered almonds
1 bag Tostitos® Multigrain Rounds Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Beat the cream cheese with the sour cream and half the honey until smooth.
Stir in  3/4 cup feta, the dates, parsley and pepper.
Transfer to a shallow serving dish.
Scatter the remaining feta and almonds over top.
Bake at 375° F (190° C) for 15 minutes or until warmed through.
Drizzle with the remaining honey.
Serve with Tostitos® Rounds Multigrain Tortilla Chips.
Makes 12 servings.
Tip: Prepare the dip up to 1 day in advance and bake before serving.

Title: Fresh Cherry Tomato & Avocado Salad Cups
Description: Create the tastiest Fresh Cherry Tomato & Avocado Salad Cups, Tostitos® own Fresh Cherry Tomato & Avocado Salad Cups Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Fresh Cherry Tomato & Avocado Salad Cups for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 cups cherry tomatoes, quartered
1 avocado, peeled and chopped
1 green onion, finely chopped
2 tbsp extra virgin oil olive
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh parsley
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh basil
1 tsp dried oregano leaves
1 tsp lemon juice
 1/2 tsp salt
 1/4 tsp freshly ground black pepper
40 ( 1/2 bag) Tostitos®  Scoops!®  Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Toss the tomatoes with the avocado, green onion, olive oil, parsley, basil, oregano, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Cover and chill for up to 1 hour.
Spoon into Tostitos®  Scoops!®  Tortilla Chips and serve immediately.
Makes 40 bites.

Title: Sautéed Veggie Scoops!®
Description: Create the tastiest Sautéed Veggie Scoops!®, Tostitos® own Veggie Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Sautéed Veggies Scoops!® for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil
1 small zucchini, diced
1 small yellow squash, diced
1 red onion, finely diced
1 red bell pepper, diced
1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
1/2 pound Pepper Jack Cheese, shredded
1/2 cup Tostitos® Salsa
1 bag Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium‑high heat; add zucchini, yellow squash, onion and red pepper. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Sauté for about 7 minutes or until tender and golden.
Remove from heat; transfer to bowl and mix in cheese and salsa.
Place tablespoonful (15 mL) of the mixture into each Tostitos® Scoops!® chip. Bake in preheated 300°F (150°C) oven for about 10 minutes or until the cheese melts. Serve immediately.

Title: Pizza Rounds
Description: Create the tastiest Pizza Rounds, Tostitos® own Pizza Rounds Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Pizza Rounds for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/4 cup pizza sauce
1/4 cup finely chopped green pepper
1/4 cup finely chopped mushroom
1/4 cup finely chopped pepperoni
1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
40 (1/5 bag) Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Arrange the Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds tortilla chips in an even layer on a baking sheet.
Top each chip with a dollop of sauce.
Toss the green pepper with the mushrooms and pepperoni.
Divide between chips and top with cheese.
Broil for 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Carefully transfer to a serving platter.
Serve immediately.

Title: Sweet Ricotta Tarts with Fresh Berries
Description: Create the tastiest Sweet Ricotta Tarts with Fresh Berries, Tostitos® own Sweet Ricotta Tarts with Fresh Berries Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Sweet Ricotta Tarts with Fresh Berries for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 cup assorted fresh berries such as raspberries, blueberries, blackberries or chopped strawberries
2 tbsp brown sugar, divided
1/2 cup ricotta cheese, room temperature
1/2 cup mascarpone cheese, room temperature
1 tsp vanilla extract
1/2 tsp ground cinnamon
2 tbsp honey
40 (1/2 bag) Tostitos® Scoops!®  Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Toss the berries with half the brown sugar; set aside.
In a separate bowl, stir the ricotta with the mascarpone, vanilla, cinnamon and remaining brown sugar.
Spoon into the Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips and top with berries.
Drizzle each chip with honey.
Serve immediately.
Makes 40 bites.
Tip: When fresh berries are out of season, use thawed frozen berries that have been blotted dry with paper towel.

Title: Tabbouleh Scoops!®
Description: Create the tastiest Tabbouleh Scoops, Tostitos® own Tabbouleh Scoops Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Tabbouleh Scoops for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/4 cup instant couscous
1/2 tomato, seeded and chopped
1/2 cup  finely chopped parsley
2 tbsp finely chopped mint
1/4 tsp each salt and pepper
3 tbsp herb flavoured vinaigrette
40 (1/2 bag) Tostitos® Scoops!®  Multigrain Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Prepare the couscous according to package directions.
Toss with tomato, parsley, mint, salt and pepper; stir in dressing.
Divide evenly between Tostitos®  Scoops!® Multigrain Tortilla Chips.
Serve immediately.
Makes 40 bites.

Title: Tiramisu Scoops!®
Description: Create the tastiest Tiramisu Scoops, Tostitos® own Tiramisu Scoops Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Tiramisu Scoops for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 cup 35% whipping cream
1/4 cup icing sugar
1 tbsp instant espresso
1 tsp vanilla extract
1/2 cup mascarpone cheese
1 tsp ground cocoa powder
2 crisp ladyfingers, broken into pieces
40 (1/2 bag) Tostitos®  Scoops!®  Multigrain Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Place the cream, sugar, espresso and vanilla in a large bowl.
Beat, with an electric mixer on high, for 3 minutes or until stiff.
Stir half of the whipped cream mixture with the mascarpone.
Gently fold in the remaining whipped cream mixture.
Spoon into the Tostitos® Scoops!® Multigrain Tortilla Chips and arrange on a serving platter.
Dust with cocoa powder.
Garnish with ladyfinger pieces.
Makes 40 bites.
Tip: For best results be sure to beat your own cream using the cream found in the dairy case.

Title: Turkey Chili Nacho Dip
Description: Create the tastiest Turkey Chili Nacho Dip, Tostitos® own Turkey Chili Nacho Dip Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Turkey Chili Nacho Dip for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 tbsp oil
1/4 cup chopped onion
1 lb ground turkey
1/4 tsp each salt and pepper
1 jar Tostitos® Medium Salsa
3/4 cup shredded marble or Cheddar cheese
1/4 cup chopped pickled or fresh jalapeno peppers
1 bag Tostitos Cantina®  Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Preheat the broiler to high.
Heat the oil in a large nonstick skillet set over medium‑high heat.
Cook the onion for 3 minutes.
Crumble in the turkey; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Cook, breaking up into small pieces, for 5 to 7 minutes or until browned.
Stir in the salsa; simmer for 5 minutes.
Transfer to a casserole dish.
Sprinkle with shredded cheese and jalapeno.
Broil for 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Serve with Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips.
Make 12 servings.
Tip: Make the dip up to 2 days in advance and broil just before serving.

Title: Canadian Cheese Steak
Description: Create the tastiest Canadian Cheese Steak, Tostitos® own Canadian Cheese Steak Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Canadian Cheese Steak for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 cup shaved beef sirloin
1/4 cup onion (sliced)
1/4 cup green pepper (sliced)
1/4 cup provolone cheese (shredded)
1/2 cup green onions (optional)
1 tsp Montreal steak spice
1 tsp steak spice
20 Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick tortilla chips
Directions:
Sauté green pepper and onions over med‑high heat until soft.
Set aside.
Sprinkle Montreal steak spice on shaved beef sirloin and in a separate pan, sauté over high heat for 1 minute per side.
Season with steak spice.
Add cooked vegetables to beef and sauté 1 minute.
Sprinkle cheese on top and take pan off heat while cheese melts.
Arrange Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick tortilla chips neatly on a serving dish and cover with beef and melted cheese mixture.
Garnish with green onions.

Title: Salted Caramel & Chocolate Bark
Description: Create the tastiest Salted Caramel & Chocolate Bark, Tostitos® own Salted Caramel & Chocolate Bark Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Salted Caramel & Chocolate Bark for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 cup butter
1/2 cup brown sugar
1/8 tsp salt
1/4 tsp vanilla extract
1/4 cup chocolate 70%
2 tbsp white chocolate
20 Tostitos Cantina®  Extra Thin tortilla chips
Directions:
In a small saucepan, melt butter and sugar together over medium heat.
Set aside and allow to cool for 15 minutes.
Melt dark chocolate in a small saucepan or microwave until it is a creamy texture.
Melt white chocolate in a small saucepan or microwave until it is a creamy texture.
Drizzle caramel, dark chocolate and white chocolate evenly over chips.
Sprinkle salt and cool for 10 minutes.

Title: Brie Bites Three Ways
Description: Create the tastiest Brie Bites Three Ways, Tostitos® own Brie Bites Three Ways Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Brie Bites Three Ways for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 pack Brie cheese (cut into small cubes)
1 jar Apricot jam
1 handful Crushed walnuts
1 can Cranberry jelly
1 Ripe cantaloupe or honeydew melon
5 slices Prosciutto (cut in half and rolled)
1 bag Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips
Directions:
Apricot Walnut Brie Bites:


Evenly place slices of brie into each Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chip.

Dollop apricot jam to partially cover brie.

Sprinkle lightly crushed walnuts to finish.


Cranberry Brie Bites:


Evenly place slices of brie into each Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chip.

Dollop cranberry jelly over brie to partially cover.


Prosciutto Melon Brie Bites:


Evenly place slices of brie into each Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chip.

Slice prosciutto piece in half, roll and place on top of brie.

Dollop finely diced melon on top of prosciutto.

Title: Summer Mango Salsa with Flaked Salmon
Description: Create the tastiest Summer Mango Salsa with Flaked Salmon, Tostitos® own Summer Mango Salsa with Flaked Salmon Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Summer Mango Salsa with Flaked Salmon for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 ripe mango (peeled and chopped into squares)
1/3 cup cilantro
1 1/8 cups BC salmon
1/4 cup white onion
1/4 wedge of lime
Dash of olive oil
Pinch of salt and pepper
1 bag Tostitos® Multigrain Rounds tortilla chips
1/3 cup Tostitos® Roasted Red Pepper Salsa
Directions:
Salmon:


Preheat oven to 375° F.

Coat salmon skin in olive oil, flip the salmon and sprinkle salt and pepper on top finishing with a squeeze of lime.

Cook for 12 minutes, let cool and flake with two forks.


Mango Salsa:


In a large mixing bowl, mix mango squares with cilantro, onion, Tostitos® Roasted Red Pepper Salsa and flaked salmon.
Stir while squeezing lime into the mixture.

Serve over Tostitos® Multigrain Rounds tortilla chips.

Title: Apple Crumble Minis
Description: Create the tastiest Apple Crumble Minis, Tostitos® own Apple Crumble Minis Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Apple Crumble Minis Recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
3 tbsp Unsalted butter, at room temperature, divided
2 Gala apples, peeled and finely diced
6 tbsp Brown sugar, divided
1/2 tsp Cinnamon
1 cup Finely chopped walnuts
1/4 cup Large flake oats
1/4 cup Grated cheddar
24 Tostitos® Multigrain Scoops!® tortilla chips
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°F.
Arrange Tostitos® Multigrain Scoops!® tortilla chips on a baking sheet.
Melt 2 tbsp butter in a medium saucepan over medium.
Add apples and cook until tender, 5 to 6 min.
Stir in 1/4 cup brown sugar plus cinnamon.
Cook until saucy, 2 to 3 min.
Set aside.
Stir remaining 2 tbsp brown sugar with walnuts, oats and cheddar in a small bowl until combined.
Work in remaining 1 tbsp butter, using your fingertips, until crumbly.
Divide apple mixture among Tostitos® Multigrain Scoops!® tortilla chip.
Sprinkle nut mixture over apples.
Bake in centre of oven until tops are golden, about 5 min.

Title: Chilaquiles Con Tostitos®
Description: Create the tastiest Chilaquiles Con Tostitos, Tostitos® own Chilaquiles Con Tostitos Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Chilaquiles Con Tostitos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 cup Finely chopped cured chorizo
4 Eggs
1 Avocado, diced
1/4 Red onion, thinly sliced
1/2 Crumbled feta
4 Cilantro sprigs
1 bag Tostitos Cantina®  Extra Thick tortilla chips
1 jar Tostitos®  Medium Salsa, at room temperature
Directions:
Toss Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick tortilla chips with salsa in a large bowl until combined.
Set aside.
Heat a large frying pan over medium high.
Add chorizo and cook until crisp, 2 to 3 min.
Transfer to a plate.
Crack eggs into pan.
Cook, covered, until whites are cooked, but yolks are still runny, 2 to 3 min.
Divide chips and salsa among 4 plates.
Top each with chorizo, avocado, red onion and a fried egg.
Sprinkle with feta and garnish with a cilantro sprig.

Title: Thai Chicken Taco Bites
Description: Create the tastiest Thai Chicken Taco Bites, Tostitos® own Thai Chicken Taco Bites Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Thai Chicken Taco Bites for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 cup Thinly sliced red cabbage
1/2 cup Cooked corn kernels
2 tbsp Finely chopped cilantro
1 tbsp Hoisin sauce
1 tbsp Natural peanut butter
2 tsp Water
1 tsp Sriracha
1 tsp Seasoned rice vinegar
2 Boneless, skinless chicken thighs
1/8 tsp Salt
Lime wedges, optional
24 Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips
Directions:
Preheat grill pan over medium‑high.
Combine cabbage with corn and cilantro in a small bowl.
Stir hoisin with peanut butter, water, sriracha and rice vinegar in a medium bowl until smooth.
Sprinkle chicken thighs with salt.
Season with fresh pepper.
Oil grill.
Barbecue chicken until no pink remains, 4 to 5 min per side.
Transfer to a cutting board and let stand 5 min.
Shred chicken using two forks, then add to peanut butter mixture.
Toss to coat.
Arrange Tostitos® Scoops!® on a platter.
Fill each with shredded chicken, then top with cabbage mixture.
Squeeze lime wedges over scoops just before serving.

Title: Huevos Rancheros Tapas
Description: Create the tastiest Huevos Rancheros Tapas, Tostitos® own Huevos Rancheros Tapas Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Huevos Rancheros Tapas for any occasion.
Ingredients:
3 tbsp refried beans
2 large eggs
1/4 cup grated queso fresco cheese
1 tbsp chopped fresh cilantro
3 tbsp sour cream
1/4 small ripe avocado, sliced
14 Tostitos®  Scoops!®  tortilla chips
3 tbsp Tostitos®  Salsa
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°F.
Place Tostitos®  Scoops!®  tortilla chips on a cookie sheet, filling each with refried beans and leaving a small indentation in each centre.
In a small bowl, combine eggs and cheese and spoon evenly into scoops.
Bake until cooked, about 5 minutes.
Remove from oven, then top each with salsa, cilantro, a dollop of sour cream and a slice of avocado.
Place on a plate with slices of fresh lime and serve immediately.

Title: Ultimate Four Cheese Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Ultimate Four Cheese Nachos, Tostitos® own Ultimate Four Cheese Nachos Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Ultimate Four Cheese Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/3 cup Shredded mozzarella cheese
1/3 cup Shredded Provolone cheese
1/3 cup Shredded cheddar cheese
1/4 cup Cold cream cheese, chopped
1/4 cup Chopped sundried tomatoes
1 Jalapeño, seeded and chopped
2 Green onions, sliced
2 tbsp Chopped cilantro
1/2 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick chips
1 cup Tostitos® Roasted Red Pepper Salsa
Directions:
Preheat broiler to high.
Arrange tortilla chips in layers on pizza pan with mozzarella, Provolone, cheddar cheese and cream cheese.
Sprinkle with sun‑dried tomatoes and jalapeños.
Broil for 2 to 3 minutes, until cheese is melted.
Garnish with jalapeños, green onion and cilantro.
Serve with salsa.

Title: Crunchy Jalapeño Bites
Description: Create the tastiest Crunchy Jalapeño Bites, Tostitos® own Crunchy Jalapeño Bites Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Crunchy Jalapeño Bites for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 oz Cream cheese, softened
1 tbsp Grated Parmesan cheese
1 Clove garlic, minced
1 Green onion, finely diced
2 strips Cooked bacon, crumbled
6 Jalapeños, halved and seeded
1/3 cup Tostitos® Multigrain chips, broken (about 12 chips)
2/3 cup Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Line a baking sheet with foil.
Mash cream cheese with fork until smooth.
Stir in Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso, Parmesan cheese, garlic, green onion and crumbled bacon.
Fill each jalapeño with about 1 tbsp mixture.
Place halves on prepared baking sheet.
Top with crumbled chips.
Bake for 15 to 17 minutes or until heated through, bubbly and golden.

Title: Taco Pizza
Description: Create the tastiest Taco Pizza, Tostitos® own Taco Pizza Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Taco Pizza for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 tbsp Vegetable oil
340 g Lean ground beef
1 Onion, chopped
2 Cloves garlic, minced
1 tbsp Chili powder
1/4 tsp Salt and pepper each
340 g Pizza dough
3/4 cup Shredded mozzarella and aged cheddar cheese each
1 cup Lettuce shredded
1 Tomato chopped
1/4 cup Pitted black olives sliced
1/4 cup Green onions sliced
2 tbsp Sour cream (optional)
1/3 cup Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds tortilla chips broken
1 cup Tostitos® Mild Salsa
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°F.
Heat oil in a saucepan over medium‑heat and cook beef for 5 to 7 minutes until no longer pink.
Drain fat.
To pan add onion, garlic, chili powder, salt and pepper.
Cook, for 5 minutes, stirring until onion is softened.
Let cool.
On a lightly floured surface, roll dough to 12‑inch round.
Place on 12‑inch pizza pan.
Spread with salsa.
Top with meat mixture and cheese.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Immediately top with lettuce, tomatoes, olives and green onions.
Sprinkle crushed chips over‑top.
Dollop with sour cream, if desired.

Title: Hashbrown Waffle Breakfast Stack
Description: Create the tastiest Hashbrown Waffle Breakfast Stack, Tostitos® own Hashbrown Waffle Breakfast Stack Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Hashbrown Waffle Breakfast Stack for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 russet potatoes, peeled (about 1 lb)
4 Eggs (prepared to your liking)
2 tbsp all-purpose flour
1 can Cooking spray
1 egg
1/2 tsp each salt and pepper
1/2 cup Tostitos® Medium Salsa
Directions:
Grate potatoes and squeeze out any liquid.
In a bowl, toss potato with egg, flour, salt and pepper.
Preheat waffle iron to medium‑high.
Grease with cooking spray.
Divide potato mixture into quarters.
Place in waffle iron for 5 to 7 minutes or until golden and crispy.
Top each waffle with 2 tbsp Tostitos® Salsa and a fried egg.
Season with additional salt and pepper, if desired.

Title: Twice Baked Tex Mex Sweet Potatoes
Description: Create the tastiest Twice Baked Tex Mex Sweet Potatoes, Tostitos® own Twice Baked Tex Mex Sweet Potatoes Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Twice Baked Tex Mex Sweet Potatoes for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 Medium sweet potatoes (about 1 1/2 lb), halved lengthwise
1/2 tsp Salt, divided
1/4 tsp Pepper
2 tbsp Butter
1 cup Shredded cooked chicken
1/2 cup Corn niblets
1/2 cup Canned black beans, drained and rinsed
1/4 cup Chopped green onions
1 cup Grated aged cheddar cheese
1/4 cup Sour cream
1/4 cup Tostitos® Mild Salsa
1/4 cup Tostitos® Multigrain tortilla chips (broken)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Line baking sheet with parchment paper or foil.
Season sweet potato with 1/4 tsp (1 mL) each salt and pepper.
Place cut side down on prepared baking sheet.
Bake for 45 to 50 minutes or until fork tender.
Scoop out flesh from halves into a bowl, leaving about a 1/2‑inch (1 cm) layer inside skins.
Set skins aside.
Mash sweet potato flesh with butter.
Stir in chicken, corn, black beans and green onions.
Divide filling evenly among the four potato skins.
Sprinkle each with cheese.
Bake for 15 to 18 minutes or until warmed through and cheese is melted.
Garnish with Tostitos® salsa, sour cream and Tostitos® chips.

Title: Enchilada Skillet
Description: Create the tastiest Enchilada Skillet, Tostitos® own Enchilada Skillet Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Enchilada Skillet for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 tbsp Vegetable oil
1 lb Lean ground beef
1 Onion, diced
2 Cloves garlic, minced
1 Green pepper, seeded and diced
1 cup Corn niblets
1 can Black beans, drained and rinsed
1 tbsp Tomato paste
1/2 cup Shredded aged orange cheddar cheese
2 tbsp Chopped cilantro
1 3/4 cup Tostitos® Salsa, mild or medium
1 cup  Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin Tortilla Chips, crumbled
Directions:
In a 9 or 10‑inch skillet, heat oil over medium‑high heat.
Sauté ground beef, onion and garlic for 5 minutes or until browned.
Add green pepper, corn, black beans and sauté for 4 minutes.
Stir in salsa and tomato paste.
Bring to boil, reduce heat to medium‑low and simmer for 10 minutes or until slightly thickened.
Top with tortillas and cheese.
Broil for 2 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Sprinkle with cilantro.

Title: Cheesy Chicken Flautas
Description: Create the tastiest Cheesy Chicken Flautas, Tostitos® own Cheesy Chicken Flautas Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Cheesy Chicken Flautas for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 cups Shredded cooked chicken
1 cup Corn niblets
2 Green onions, sliced
1/2 cup Shredded cheddar cheese
8 Small flour tortillas
A few Lime wedges
1/2 cup Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso
1/2 cup Tostitos® Salsa, mild
Directions:
In bowl, stir chicken with queso, salsa, corn, green onions and cheddar cheese.
Divide evenly among tortillas, placing the mixture along one end of the tortilla and wrapping tightly to make a “flute” shape (flauta is flute in Spanish).
Place flautas, side by side in and 8‑inch baking dish.
Coat lightly with cooking spray.
Bake in 375°F (190°C) oven for about 20 minutes or until filling is warmed through and tortillas are crisp.
Serve with more queso, salsa and lime wedges.

Title: Savoury Crepes
Description: Create the tastiest Savoury Crepes, Tostitos® own Savoury Crepes Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Savoury Crepes for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 3/4 cups Milk
1/4 cup Unsalted butter, melted
4 large Eggs
1/2 tsp Salt
1 1/2 cups All-purpose flour
8 Eggs, scrambled
2 tbsp Chopped sun-dried tomatoes
1/2 cup Crumbled feta cheese
1/4 cup Chopped fresh chives
1 cup Tostitos® Roasted Red Pepper Salsa
Directions:
Crepes: Add milk, butter, eggs and salt to blender.
Mix until well combined.
Add the flour and blend for 15 to 20 seconds until smooth.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Heat an 8‑inch crepe pan or a non‑stick skillet over medium heat.
Coat with cooking spray.
Pour 1/4 cup (60 mL) batter into pan, swirl to cover bottom.
Cook for 1 minute or until crepe begins to curl around edges.
Flip and cook for an additional 30 seconds or until set.
Transfer to plate.
Repeat with additional cooking spray and remaining batter.
Layer crepes between waxed paper to prevent sticking.
Place eggs, sun‑dried tomatoes, feta and chives onto centre of crepes.
Roll to enclose.
Top each with Roasted Red Pepper Salsa.

Title: Shrimp Tostada Bites
Description: Create the tastiest Shrimp Tostada Bites, Tostitos® own Shrimp Tostada Bites Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Shrimp Tostada Bites for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 lb Raw de-veined large shrimp, tails removed (31-35)
1/2 tsp Salt
1/2 tsp Chipotle chile powder
2 tbsp Lime juice
2 tbsp Vegetable oil
3/4 cup Guacamole
1/4 cup Cilantro leaves
A few Lime Wedges
31 to 35 Tostitos® Multigrain Bite Size Rounds
Directions:
Toss shrimp with salt, chipotle powder and lime juice.
Let stand for 15 minutes.
Heat oil in skillet over medium‑high heat.
Fry shrimp until pink and cooked through, about 3 to 4 minutes.
Place 1 tsp (5 mL) guacamole on each round.
Top each with a shrimp and cilantro leaf.
Serve with lime wedges.

Title: Tortilla Soup
Description: Create the tastiest Tortilla Soup, Tostitos® own Tortilla Soup Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Tortilla Soup for any occasion.
Ingredients:
6 cups Low-sodium chicken broth
1 1/2 cups Shredded cooked chicken
1/2 cup Each canned pinto and black beans, drained and rinsed
1 tsp Tex-Mex seasoning blend
1 avocado, diced
1/4 cup Shredded cheddar cheese
1/4 cup Cilantro leaves
A few Lime wedges
1/2 cup Tostitos® Salsa, mild
1 cup Tostitos® Multigrain Chips crumbled
Directions:
In saucepan over medium‑heat, combine chicken broth, salsa, cooked chicken, pinto and black beans and Tex‑Mex seasoning.
Bring to boil then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve topped with avocado, chips, cheddar cheese, cilantro and lime wedges.

Title: Chocolate & Bacon Explosion
Description: Create the tastiest Chocolate & Bacon Explosion, Tostitos® own Chocolate & Bacon Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Chocolate & Bacon Explosion for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 cup dark chocolate chips
1 cup white chocolate chips
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
6 strips cooked bacon, crumbled
Directions:
Place dark chocolate chips and white chocolate chips in separate microwavable bowls.
Microwave each bowl separately, stirring every 30 seconds, for about 1 1/2 minutes or until chocolate is melted.
On parchment or waxed paper–lined baking sheets, arrange Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips in single layer; drizzle with dark and white chocolate.
Sprinkle bacon over top.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until set.

Title: Fancy Grilled Cheese Bites
Description: Create the tastiest Fancy Grilled Cheese Bites, Tostitos® own Grilled Cheese Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Grilled Cheese Recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
10 slices Cheddar cheese
3 large slices thinly sliced deli ham
2 tart apples, thinly sliced
1 bag Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds Tortilla Chips
Directions:
Using 1 1/2‑inch round cutter, cut out 40 rounds of Cheddar, 20 rounds of ham and 20 rounds of apples.
Place half of the chips (about 20) on parchment paper–lined baking sheet.
Top each with 1 round of cheese, 1 round of apple, 1 round of ham, then remaining cheese.
Bake in 375°F oven for about 3 minutes or until warmed through and cheese is melted.
Remove from oven; top each with another chip to make a sandwich.
Serve warm.

Title: Tuna Melts
Description: Create the tastiest Tuna Melta, Tostitos® own Tuna Melt Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Tuna Melt Recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 cans flaked light tuna
4 green onions, sliced
1 stalk celery, diced
1/4 cup  light mayonnaise
1 tbsp  Dijon mustard
1 tsp  freshly ground pepper
1 bag Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips
2 cups Cheddar cheese
1 cup Tostitos® mild or medium salsa
Directions:
In large bowl, mix together tuna, half of the green onions, celery, mayonnaise, mustard and pepper until well combined.
Spread Tostitos® Restaurant Style tortilla chips on parchment paper– lined baking sheet.
Spoon 1 tsp (5 mL) of the tuna mixture onto each tortilla chip; sprinkle with cheese.
Bake in preheated 375°F (190°C) oven for about 12 minutes or until warmed through and cheese is melted; sprinkle remaining green onions over top.
Serve with salsa.

Title: Jacked Up Salsa
Description: Create the tastiest Jacked Up Salsa, Tostitos® own Salsa Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Salsa Recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado
1 cob of corn
1 handful of green onions
1 jar Tostitos® Medium Salsa
Directions:
Pour salsa into serving bowl.
Dice ripe avocado into cubes.
Run knife along cob of corn until all kernels are removed.
Chop green onion.
Pour salsa into serving bowl.
Add all ingredients into salsa, stir and serve.

Title: Buffalo Chicken Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Buffalo Chicken Nachos, Tostitos® own Nacho Recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Nacho Recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 bag Tostitos® tortilla chips or Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips
2 cups cooked shredded chicken
1/4 cup Buffalo style hot sauce
1/2 cup Tostitos® salsa, mild
1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese
1/4 cup finely chopped celery
3 green onions, sliced
Directions:
Place chips on baking sheet.
Toss shredded chicken with hot sauce and spread evenly over chips.
Divide salsa and blue cheese evenly among chips.
Broil for 1 minute or until cheese is melted.
Sprinkle with celery and green onions before serving.

Title: California Sushi Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest California Sushi Nachos, Tostitos® own Sushi Nachos with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Sushi Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds tortilla chips
1 1/2 cups shredded mild Cheddar cheese
1 lb surimi (imitation crabmeat), chopped
1 red pepper, chopped
1 avocado, peeled, pitted and chopped
1/2 English cucumber, seeded and chopped
3 sheets toasted nori, sliced into thin strips
1 tbsp sesame seeds, toasted
2/3 cup mayonnaise
2 tsp wasabi paste
2 tsp chopped pickled ginger
Directions:
Arrange Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds tortilla chips on large rimmed baking sheet.
Sprinkle cheese and surimi evenly over top.
Bake in preheated 400°F (200°C) oven for about 10 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Wasabi Mayonnaise: In small bowl, stir together mayonnaise, wasabi paste and pickled ginger.
Set aside.
To serve, sprinkle red pepper, avocado and cucumber over nachos.
Drizzle with Wasabi Mayonnaise and garnish with nori strips and sesame seeds.

Title: Holiday Sweet Potato Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Holiday Sweet Potato Nachos, Tostitos® own Nachos with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin tortilla chips
2 lb sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
1 tbsp butter, softened
1/2 tsp salt
3/4 cup chopped pecans
3 cups miniature marshmallows
Directions:
In saucepan of boiling water, cook sweet potatoes, covered, for about 15 minutes or until tender.
Drain and transfer to large bowl.
Mash with butter and salt until smooth.
Fold in 1/4 cup (50 mL) of the chopped pecans.
Spread one‑third of the Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin tortilla chips in lightly greased large rimmed baking sheet.
Top with one‑third each of sweet potato mixture, marshmallows and pecans; repeat layers twice.
Bake in preheated 375°F (190°C) oven for about 10 minutes or until golden.
Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.

Title: Italian Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Italian Nachos, Tostitos® own Nachos with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin tortilla chips
1 lb Italian sausage
1/2 cup sliced black olives
2 fresh tomatoes, seeded and chopped
2 1/2 cups shredded Italian blend cheese
1/2 cup basil pesto
1 cup marinara or pasta sauce
Directions:
Remove sausage from casings.
In large skillet, cook sausage over medium‑high heat, breaking up with a spoon, for about 7 minutes or until starting to brown.
Remove from heat; drain any excess fat and set sausage aside.
Spread half of the Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin tortilla chips on lightly greased large rimmed baking sheet.
Sprinkle half of the sausage, olives, tomatoes and cheese over top.
Repeat layers, ending with cheese.
Bake in preheated 375°F (190°C) oven for 12 to 15 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Spoon pesto over top; let stand for 5 minutes.
Serve with marinara sauce.

Title: Gravy Poutine Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Poutine Nachos, Tostitos® own Nachos with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds tortilla chips
1/4 cup butter
1/4 cup all-purpose flour
2 cups beef broth
2 tsp soy sauce
Pinch freshly ground pepper
2 cups cheese curds, at room temperature, torn into bite-size pieces
1/2 cup chopped green onions
Directions:
In saucepan, melt butter over medium‑high heat.
Whisk in flour and cook, stirring constantly, for about 5 minutes or until lightly golden.
In slow, steady stream, gradually whisk in beef broth and soy sauce; bring to boil.
Cook, stirring, for about 2 minutes or until gravy thickens.
Season with pepper to taste.
Arrange Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds tortilla chips in 13‑ x 9‑inch (3.5 L) baking dish; top with cheese curds and ladle hot gravy over top.
Bake for 5 or 6 minutes in preheated 400°F (200°C) oven or until cheese is softened.
Garnish with green onions; serve immediately.

Title: Pumpkin Tortilla Scoops!®
Description: Create the tastiest Pumpkin Tortilla Scoops!®, Tostitos® own Pumpkin recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Pumpkin recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips
1 cup pumpkin purée
1 can white kidney beans, drained and rinsed
3 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil
1 tbsp lemon juice
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp chopped fresh thyme
1/2 tsp chopped fresh rosemary
1/4 tsp salt
1/4 tsp freshly ground pepper
1/4 cup roasted salted pumpkin seeds
Directions:
In food processor, purée pumpkin, kidney beans, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, thyme, rosemary, salt and pepper until smooth.
Spoon 2 tsp into each Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips.
Sprinkle with pumpkin seeds.

Title: Squash and Maple Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Squash and Maple Nachos, Tostitos® own Nachos with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Nachos for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin tortilla chips
3 cups diced peeled butternut squash (about 1 medium squash)
2 tsp olive oil
Pinch each salt and pepper
1/2 cup walnut pieces
1/4 cup maple syrup
1 tsp cinnamon
1/2 tsp chili powder
1 1/2 cups shredded white Cheddar cheese
1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese
1/2 cup dried cranberries
1/4 cup chopped green onions
1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
In bowl, toss together squash, olive oil, salt and pepper.
Place on parchment paper–lined baking sheet; roast in preheated 400° F (200° C) oven, tossing occasionally, for 15 to 20 minutes or just until tender and golden brown.
Return to bowl; toss with walnuts, maple syrup, cinnamon and chili powder.
Spread half of the Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin tortilla chips on large rimmed baking sheet.
Sprinkle with half of the squash mixture and half of the Cheddar cheese.
Top with another layer of tortilla chips and sprinkle with remaining squash mixture.
Sprinkle feta cheese, cranberries and remaining Cheddar cheese evenly over top.
Bake in preheated 375°F (190°C) oven for 12 to 15 minutes or until cheese is melted; let stand for 5 minutes.
Garnish with green onions and cilantro.

Title: Chicken Mango Scoops!®
Description: Create the tastiest Chicken Mango Scoops!®, Tostitos® own Chicken recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Chicken recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 bag Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips
1 cup cooked shredded chicken or turkey breast
1  1/2 cups finely shredded red cabbage
 1/4 cup grated carrots
⅓ cup Tostitos® Mango Salsa
 1/4 cup sliced green onions
 1/4 cup chopped peanuts (optional)
Directions:
Arrange the Tostitos® Scoops!® tortilla chips on a serving platter.
Divide the red cabbage evenly between the chips.
Top with chicken (or turkey), dividing evenly between the chips.
Top chicken (or turkey) with the carrots and Tostitos® Mango Salsa.
Garnish each with green onions and/or peanuts (if using).

Title: Cheeseburger Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Cheeseburger Nachos, Tostitos® own Nachos recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Nachos recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 lb ground beef
 1/2 tsp kosher salt
 1/4 tsp freshly ground black pepper
 1/4 tsp garlic powder
1 bag Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips
2 jars Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso
1 cup shredded iceberg lettuce
 1/2 cup chopped red onions
 1/2 cup chopped and seeded tomatoes
 1/2 cup sliced pickles
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350ºF.
Place ground beef in a large skillet with salt, pepper and garlic powder.
Brown beef over medium‑high heat until cooked through.
Drain off any fat.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place tortilla chips evenly over baking sheet.
Top chips with 1 jar Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso, followed by cooked beef.
Top beef with another jar of Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso and place in oven for 6‑8 minutes, until heated through.
Remove from oven and top with lettuce, onions, tomatoes and pickles.

Title: Fried Egg and Tostitos® Salsa Sandwich
Description: Create the tastiest Fried Egg and Tostitos® Salsa Sandwich, Tostitos® own Salsa recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Salsa recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
2 flat bagels, toasted
1 small ripe avocado, sliced
2 tbsp grated white cheddar cheese
2 tsp olive oil
2 large eggs
 1/4 cup Tostitos® Medium Salsa
Pinch kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Place toasted bagels on a serving plate.
Top half of each bagel with sliced avocado.
Sprinkle white cheddar cheese over avocado.
In a small skillet, heat olive oil over medium‑low heat.
Fry eggs until they reach your preferred level of doneness.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Place fried eggs over cheese and top each sandwich with salsa.
Serve immediately

Title: Chicken and Mango Salsa Bites
Description: Create the tastiest Chicken and Mango Salsa Bites, Tostitos® own Chicken recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Chicken recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 cup chopped deli rotisserie chicken
 1/4 cup chopped red bell peppers
1 tbsp mayonnaise
1 tsp fresh lime juice
25-30 Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds Tortilla Chips
 1/2 cup Tostitos® Mango Salsa
Pinch kosher salt
Chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, for garnish, optional
Directions:
In a small bowl, toss chicken, red peppers, mayonnaise, lime juice and salt together.
Place a spoonful on top of each Tostitos® Bite Size Rounds Tortilla Chip and top with a dollop of Tostitos® Mango Salsa.
Garnish with chopped parsley, if desired.

Title: Philly Cheese Steak Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Philly Cheese Steak Nachos, Tostitos® own Steak recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Steak recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin Tortilla Chips
2 tbsp olive oil
2 onions, chopped
2 green bell peppers, chopped
6 oz shaved deli roast beef, roughly chopped
2 cups shredded provolone cheese
1 jar Tostitos® Salsa, mild, medium or hot
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°F.
In skillet, heat oil over medium‑high heat; sauté onions and peppers for 3 to 5 minutes or until tender.
Let cool slightly.
On pizza pan, layer tortilla chips, onions and peppers, roast beef and cheese; bake for 2 to 4 minutes until cheese starts to melt.
Serve immediately with salsa.

Title: Cool Greek-Style Nachos
Description: Create the tastiest Cool Greek-Style Nachos, Tostitos® own Nachos recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Nachos recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips
1 cup finely chopped, seeded tomato (about 1 large tomato)
1 cup finely chopped cucumber
1/2 cup sliced black olives
1/4 cup finely chopped red onion
1 cup tzatziki sauce
1 cup finely crumbled feta cheese
Directions:
On serving platter, arrange half of the tortilla chips.
Top with half each of the tomato, cucumber, black olives and red onion.
Drizzle with half of the tzatziki sauce.
Repeat layers; sprinkle with feta.
Serve immediately.

Title: Shrimp Mango Salad
Description: Create the tastiest Shrimp Mango Salad, Tostitos® own Shrimp recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Shrimp recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1/2 cup Tostitos® Mango Salsa
1 lb thawed frozen cooked large shrimp (16/20 count), tails removed
6 cups mixed greens
1/4 cup prepared salad dressing
1/4 red onion, thinly sliced
1 ripe avocado, peeled, pitted and chopped
Lime wedges (optional)
Directions:
Toss shrimp with salsa; set aside. Toss mixed greens with dressing.
Divide mixed greens among 4 plates; spoon shrimp mixture alongside greens. Top with red onion and avocado. Serve with lime wedges (if using).

Title: Mixed Bean Mango Salsa with Avocado
Description: Create the tastiest Mixed Bean Mango Salsa with Avocado, Tostitos® own Salsa recipe with step-by-step instructions. Make the best Salsa recipe for any occasion.
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos® Scoops!® Tortilla Chips
1 jar Tostitos® Mango Salsa
1 cup canned mixed beans, drained and rinsed
1 ripe avocado, peeled, pitted and chopped
2 tbsp lime juice
1 tsp hot sauce
1 tbsp chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Stir together mango salsa, beans, avocado, lime juice, hot sauce; sprinkle with cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

Title: Chicken Fajita Nachos
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos® Restaurant Style tortilla chips
2 tsp olive oil
 1/2 cup thinly sliced red onion
1  1/2 cups cubed cooked chicken breast
1 cup each chopped red and green pepper
2 cups shredded Tex Mex cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350F.  Spread Tostitos® Restaurant Style tortilla chips in a single layer on a large cookie sheet.
Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium heat. Add red onions and cook, stirring frequently, until onions have softened slightly, 2 minutes.  Allow to cool slightly.
Sprinkle cheese evenly over chips. Top with onion, chicken and peppers.
Bake in preheated oven until cheese melts, 7‑9 minutes. Serve warm with your favourite Tostitos® Salsa.

Title: Avocado Chipotle Bites
Ingredients:
1 bag Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thin Tortilla Chips
1 ripe avocado, peeled and pitted
1/2 cup sour cream
1 tbsp lime juice
1/2 tsp ground cumin
1/4 ts peach salt and pepper
1 1/2 cups cubed cooked grilled chicken breast (about 1/2 lb, 1 small chicken breast)
1/4 cup finely chopped red bell pepper
Directions:
Mash avocado until smooth. Stir in sour cream, lime juice, cumin, salt and pepper until smooth.
Place piece of chicken on each tortilla chip; top with dollop of avocado cream. Sprinkle with red pepper.

Title: Summer Garden Scoops!*
Ingredients:
60 mL ( 1/4 cup) finely diced red onion
125 mL ( 1/2 cup) finely diced red pepper
125 mL ( 1/2 cup) finely diced seeded English cucumber
60 mL ( 1/4 cup) crumbled feta cheese
10 mL (2 tsp.) olive oil
7.5 mL (1  1/2 tsp.) red wine vinegar
2.5 mL ( 1/2 tsp.) fresh basil
1 mL ( 1/4 tsp.) freshly ground pepper
1 mL ( 1/4 tsp.) salt
 1/2 bag Tostitos* Scoops!* tortilla chips (approx. 30)

Optional:
10 pitted Kalamata olives, quartered
Directions:
In a medium bowl combine red onion, red pepper, cucumber and feta cheese.
Add olive oil, vinegar, basil, pepper and salt. Toss to combine.
Place 7.5 mL (1  1/2 tsp.) of mixture on each Tostitos* Scoops!* tortilla chip. Top with olive slices, dividing evenly, if using.

Title: Warm Kale Triangles
Ingredients:
1/2 bag Tostitos Cantina® Chipotle Thins tortilla chips (about 30)
1  tsp olive oil
1 tsp butter
8 oz button mushrooms, cleaned and sliced
1/2 cup thinly sliced red pepper strips, cut into 1 inch lengths
1 clove garlic, minced
1  cups finely shredded kale
Pinch of each salt and pepper
2 tbsp goat cheese, crumbled (optional)
1 tbsp finely chopped chives (optional)
Directions:
Place chips in a single layer on a serving platter.
Heat oil and butter in a large non‑stick frying pan over medium high heat. When butter begins to foam add mushrooms, and cook, stirring occasionally, until beginning to brown, about 2‑3 minutes.
Add red pepper and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, until peppers are softened, about 2 minutes longer.
Add kale and cook, stirring frequently, until kale is wilted, about 1 minute longer. Season with salt and pepper.
Remove from heat. Place 1 tsp of mushroom mixture on each chip.

Title: Baked Avocado Eggs
Ingredients:
2 firm (but ripe) avocados, halved and pitted
4 eggs
1/4 tsp each salt and freshly ground pepper
1/4 cup Tostitos® Roasted Red Pepper Salsa
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°F. Line 8‑inch (2 L) square baking pan with foil. Using a spoon, scoop out some of the avocado flesh to create a divot large enough to fit an egg. (Reserve flesh for another use.)
Place avocado halves in prepared pan so they fit snugly against each other; fold foil around avocados to prevent tipping. Crack 1 egg into each avocado half; season with salt and pepper.
Bake until whites are set and yolks are cooked to desired doneness, approximately 18 to 20 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes. To serve, top with salsa.

Title: Crispy Asian Salad Cups
Description: These Asian inspired appetizers are perfect for easy entertaining. Bursting with fresh flavours, these bite size stars are sure to be a crowd pleaser.
Ingredients:
32 Simply Tostitos® Organic Scoops!
2 cups (500 mL) shredded coleslaw mix
1 cup (250 mL) cooked shredded chicken
1/2 cup (125 mL) prepared Asian sesame dressing
1/4 cup (60 mL) chopped cashews
1/4 cup (60 mL) fresh cilantro leaves
Directions:
Toss together coleslaw mix, shredded chicken and dressing until well coated. Spoon into Scoops!
Top with chopped cashews and cilantro.

Title: Mini Quinoa Power Bowls
Description: Power up your party with these protein packed snacks. With quinoa, avocado and cranberries these bowls are perfect for health conscious guests.
Ingredients:
32 Simply Tostitos® Organic Scoops!
2 cups (500 mL) shredded kale (ribs and stems removed)
1 cup (250 mL) cooked quinoa, cooled
1 ripe avocado, finely chopped
1/2 cup (125 mL) crumbled goat cheese
1/3 cup (75 mL) dried cranberries
1/3 cup (75 mL) Italian dressing
Directions:
Directions:
Toss together kale, quinoa, avocado, goat cheese and dried cranberries. 
Drizzle dressing over top and toss to coat. Spoon evenly into Scoops!

Title: Easy Chickpea Masala Dip
Description: Add some intrigue to your everyday party dip. This dressed up hummus is an easy, yet impressive way to add flare to your game-day spread.
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Simply Tostitos® Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chips
1 1/2 cups (375 mL) prepared hummus
1/2 cup (125 mL) plain 2% Greek yogurt
2 tsp (10 mL) Indian curry paste (mild or medium)
1 tomato, seeded and chopped
1/3 cup (75 mL) canned chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 tbsp (15 mL) chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Stir together hummus, Greek yogurt and curry paste. Stir in tomato. 
Top with chickpeas and cilantro. Serve with corn chips.

Title: Mini Grilled Cheese with Salsa
Description: Packed with cheesy goodness, these bite size sandwiches will be gone before you have time to say - CHEESE!
Ingredients:
64 Tostitos® Low Sodium Rounds Tortilla Chips
2/3 cup (150 mL) shredded Cheddar cheese
5 oz (150 g) Brie cheese, diced
1/2 jar (394 mL jar) Tostitos® Salsa
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC). Lay tortilla rounds on foil– or parchment paper–lined baking sheets. 
Sprinkle half of the tortilla rounds with Cheddar cheese and the remaining ones with Brie; bake for about 10 minutes or until cheese melts.
Remove from heat and sandwich Cheddar‑ and Brie‑topped rounds together. Serve with salsa for dipping.

Title: Bite-Size Spinach and Cheese Quiches
Description: These spinach packed miniature quiches are a perfect addition to any brunch spread.
Ingredients:
32 Simply Tostitos® Organic Scoops!
1/2 cup (125 mL) thawed frozen spinach
3 eggs, lightly beaten
1/4 cup (60 mL) Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso (approx.)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC). Lay Scoops! on foil or parchment paper–lined baking sheet. 
Chop spinach and squeeze out excess moisture. Whisk together eggs, 3 tbsp (45 mL) water, Salsa Con Queso and spinach. 
Scoop spoonfuls into Scoops! Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until eggs are set. Serve with additional Salsa Con Queso if desired.

Title: Sausage in a Cheesy Blanket
Description: This nacho-like dish is perfect for last minute entertaining. With minimal preparation, you will have more time to be the hostess with the most-est.
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos® Multigrain Rounds Tortilla Chips
2 mild or spicy Italian sausages, thinly sliced
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
2 jalapeño peppers, seeded and thinly sliced
1/2 jar (394 mL jar) Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso, warmed
Directions:
In large skillet set over medium‑high heat, sauté sausages, pepper and onion for about 5 minutes or until pepper and onion start to soften. Add jalapeños; cook for 2 minutes. 
Lay tortilla chips on foil or parchment paper–lined baking sheet in single layer. Scatter sausage mixture over top. Drizzle Salsa Con Queso over top.

Title: 7-Layer Nacho Dip
Description: Be the star of the party with this all-time favourite layered dip. Full of flavours and textures this dip will be finished in no time!
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos® Scoops! Tortilla Chips
1 can (14 oz/398 mL) refried beans
1 cup (250 mL) sour cream
3/4 cup (175 mL) shredded Monterey Jack cheese
2 ripe avocados, peeled and pitted
2 tbsp (30 mL) lime juice
1/4 tsp (1 mL) salt
1/2 jar (418 mL jar) Tostitos ® Tomato Salsa
1/4 cup (60 mL) pitted sliced black olives
1 green onion, thinly sliced
Directions:
In saucepan, heat refried beans just until warmed through. Spread evenly in rectangular or oval shallow glass dish. Spread sour cream over top. Sprinkle with cheese.
Mash together avocados, lime juice and salt; dollop over cheese. Top with salsa and sprinkle with black olives and green onion. Serve with Scoops! for dipping.

Title: Easy Guacamole Recipe
Description: Holy Guacamole! This fresh avocado dip couldn’t be easier to prepare. Perfect for dipping tortilla chips and veggies
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos® Multigrain Tortilla Chips
3 ripe avocados, peeled and pitted
3 tbsp (45 mL) lime juice
1/2 tsp (2 mL) salt
1/4 tsp (1 mL) ground cumin
1/3 cup (75 mL) diced white onion
1/4 cup (60 mL) chopped fresh cilantro
1 jalapeño pepper, seeded and diced
Directions:
Mash together avocados, lime juice, salt and cumin. Stir in onion, cilantro and jalapeño until well blended. 
Serve with tortilla chips.

Title: Power Guacamole
Description: Give your guacamole and power boost! Packed with kale, pumpkin seeds and yogurt- snacking has never looked (or tasted) so good!
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Simply Tostitos® Organic Blue Tortilla Chips
2 ripe avocados, peeled, pitted and chopped
1 cup (250 mL) chopped kale (ribs removed)
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 cup (60 mL) toasted pumpkin seeds
1/4 cup (60 mL) plain 2% Greek yogurt
3 tbsp (45 mL) lime juice
1/2 tsp (2 mL) salt
2 tbsp (30 mL) chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
In food processor, combine avocados, kale, garlic, pumpkin seeds, yogurt, lime juice and salt to food processor; process until coarsely chopped and mixture comes together. 
Garnish with cilantro; serve with tortilla chips.

Title: Easy Salsa Recipe
Description: The name says it all! This salsa might be super easy to prepare- but is full or fresh flavour.
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos® Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips
3 plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped
1 small onion, finely chopped
1 jalapeño pepper, seeded and diced
1/4 cup (60 mL) chopped fresh cilantro
2 tbsp (30 mL) lime juice
1/2 tsp (2 mL) salt
Directions:
Stir together tomatoes, onion, jalapeño, cilantro, lime juice and salt. Let stand for 20 minutes before serving or refrigerate for 1 hour. 
Serve with tortilla chips.

Title: Cheesy Lobster Dip
Description: This ooey-gooey dip is perfect for cold nights in. With elevated ingredients such as lobster and roasted red pepper this dip is sure to please on game night, girls night or date night.
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
1 jar (394 mL) Tostitos® Salsa Con Queso
1 cup (250 mL) lobster meat (fresh or frozen, thawed)
1/2 cup (125 mL) diced roasted red pepper
1/2 cup (125 mL) shredded Swiss or Cheddar cheese
4 tsp (20 mL) lemon juice
1 tbsp (15 mL) chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Stir together Salsa Con Queso, lobster meat, red pepper, cheese and lemon juice; transfer to small ovenproof casserole dish. 
Bake for 15 to 18 minutes or until bubbling at edges. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve with tortilla chips.

Title: Dessert Nachos
Description: Got a sweet tooth? No problem! Enjoy these fun and easy dessert nachos. Mix and match with your favourite toppings.
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
1/4 cup (60 mL) melted unsalted butter
2 tbsp (30 mL) granulated sugar
1 1/2 cups (375 mL) mini marshmallows
3/4 cup (175 mL) crumbled brownie pieces (ready-to-serve)
1/3 cup (75 mL) hot fudge sauce
2 cups (500 mL) vanilla ice cream (optional)
Directions:
Line large rimmed baking sheet with foil. Toss together tortilla chips, butter and sugar; spread evenly on baking sheet. 
Sprinkle with marshmallows and brownie pieces; broil for about 30 seconds or until marshmallows are lightly golden and softened. Drizzle with hot fudge sauce. Serve with ice cream (if using).

Title: Spicy Vegetarian Nachos
Description: Vegetarians rejoice! These nachos are full of veggies, cheese and pack some extra heat.
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
1 tbsp (15 mL) olive oil
2 cups (500 mL) finely shredded kale (ribs removed)
1 cup (250 mL) drained rinsed white kidney or cannellini beans
2 canned chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, finely chopped
Pinch each salt, pepper and cumin
2 cups (500 mL) shredded Monterey Jack Cheese
1 green onion, sliced
1 cup (250 mL) prepared salsa verde
Directions:
Heat oil in large nonstick skillet set over medium heat; cook kale, beans, peppers, salt, pepper and cumin for about 5 minutes or until beans are heated through and kale has wilted. 
Lay tortillas in single layer on parchment paper–lined baking sheet. Sprinkle bean mixture and cheese over top; broil for about 1 minute or until cheese has melted. Sprinkle with green onion and serve with salsa verde.

Title: Cheesy Sriracha and Cauliflower Nachos
Description: Cauliflower and cheese? Yes please! Add a little crunch and texture to nachos with cauliflower florets.
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
1 cup (250 mL) blanched cauliflower florets
1 cup (250 mL) cooked corn kernels (fresh, thawed or canned)
2 tbsp (30 mL) melted butter
1 tsp (5 mL) sriracha sauce (approx.)
1 cup (250 mL) shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 jar (418 mL jar) Tostitos® Salsa (mild)
1/2 cup (125 mL) sour cream
1/4 cup (60 mL) chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°F. Spread tortilla chips on rimmed baking sheet. Chop cauliflower florets; toss with corn, butter and 1 tsp (5 mL) sriracha. Sprinkle over tortilla chips. Top with Cheddar cheese. 
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. Remove from oven and transfer to serving tray. Dollop salsa and sour cream over top. Sprinkle cilantro over top; drizzle with additional sriracha if desired.

Title: Chicken Tortilla Soup
Description: This Mexican classic gets an easy twist. Ready in 30 minutes, dinner will be on the table faster than it takes to call take-out!
Ingredients:
2 cups (500 mL) Tostitos Cantina® Chipotle Thins Tortilla Chips, lightly crushed
6 cups (1.5 L) sodium-reduced chicken broth
2 cups (500 mL) shredded cooked chicken
1 cup (250 mL) Tostitos® Salsa, mild or medium
1 tbsp (15 mL) Tex-Mex seasoning
1/2 cup (125 mL) shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1 jalapeño pepper, thinly sliced into rings
Lime wedges
Directions:
In saucepan set over medium heat, bring chicken broth, chicken, salsa and Tex‑Mex seasoning to boil. Reduce heat to medium‑low; simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until flavourful and slightly reduced.  
Divide among bowls; top with tortilla chips, cheese and jalapeño pepper. Serve with lime wedges.

Title: Game Day Nachos
Description: Stay fueled on game day. These meaty nachos will surely have you rooting for more!
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
1/2 lb (250 g) cooked seasoned ground beef
4 slices cooked bacon, crumbled
1/2 jar (418 mL jar) Tostitos® Salsa
1 cup (250 mL) shredded Cheddar cheese
1 green onion, sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°F. Spread tortilla chips on parchment paper–lined baking sheet. Top with ground beef, bacon,  salsa and Cheddar cheese. 
Bake for 7 to 9 minutes or until cheese melts. Garnish with green onion.

Title: Mediterranean Chicken Nachos
Description: Give your nachos a Mediterranean twist by adding roasted red peppers, olives, and basil. So simple- yet so delicious!
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
2 cups (500 mL) shredded cooked chicken
1 cup (250 mL) roasted red peppers, finely chopped
1/2 cup (125 mL) sliced black olives
1 cup (250 mL) shredded mozzarella cheese
1/4 cup (60 mL) grated Parmesan cheese
2 tbsp (30 mL) thinly sliced fresh basil leaves
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Spread tortilla chips on foil‑lined baking sheet.
Top with chicken, red peppers and olives; sprinkle mozzarella and Parmesan cheese over top. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until cheese melts. Top with basil.

Title: Hearty Vegetarian Chili with Quinoa and Black Beans
Description: Cold days are instantly warmed up with this warm and hearty chili packed with black beans and sweet potato.
Ingredients:
1 bag (220 g) Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips
2 cups (500 mL) vegetable broth
1 jar (418 mL) Tostitos® Chunky Salsa
1 cup (250 mL) finely diced sweet potato
2 tsp (10 mL) chili powder
1 cup (250 mL) canned black beans, rinsed
1 cup (250 mL) corn kernels
1 cup (250 mL) cooked quinoa
Directions:
In saucepan, heat vegetable broth, salsa, sweet potato and chili powder over medium heat; bring to boil. Add black beans and corn. 
Reduce heat; simmer for about 20 minutes or until mixture thickens and sweet potato is tender. Stir in quinoa just before serving. Serve with tortilla chips.

Title: Tortilla Taco Salad
Description: Can’t decide between tacos or a salad for lunch? Now you don’t have to! Have the best of both with this Tortilla Taco Salad.
Ingredients:
1 cup (250 mL) Tostitos Cantina® Extra Thick Tortilla Chips, crumbled
1/2 cup (125 mL) prepared coleslaw dressing
2 tsp (10 mL) Tex-Mex Seasoning
1 bag (397 g) shredded coleslaw mix
2 cups (500 mL) cooked shredded chicken
1 ripe avocado, pitted, peeled and diced
1 cup (250 mL) shredded Tex-Mex cheese
2 green onions, sliced
1 jar (418 mL) Tostitos® Salsa
Directions:
In large bowl, stir coleslaw dressing with Tex‑Mex seasoning; add coleslaw, chicken, avocado, cheese and green onions. Toss until well combined. 
Sprinkle tortilla chips over top. Serve with dollops of salsa.

Title: Pulled Pork Nachos
Description: Using prepared or left over pulled pork makes putting these nachos together a snap!
Ingredients:
